tags: is a queen in a series full of clowns
i think we could always use more arya appreciation lol
summary: i love this visual  look @ tiny little baby arya. she’s so small so vulnerable and yet A CHAMPION. she’s surrounded by all these...
body:
i love this visual 

look @ tiny little baby arya. she’s so small so vulnerable and yet A CHAMPION. she’s surrounded by all these grown ass people - knights and lords and the king and the prince and the queen - people who are supposed to stand for truth and justice. who are supposed to protect innocents like mycah but literally every other person in this scene is a fucking loser. none of them cared about the poor butchers boy. only arya was brave enough to defend mycah. only arya cared that he was being hurt and then MURDERED. only arya told the truth about what happened. only arya because her heart is so big and beautiful and brave

summary: You seem to know a lot about the books. What do you think will happen to Jaqen and Arya ? Will they be friends or enemies ?
question: You seem to know a lot about the books. What do you think will happen to Jaqen and Arya ? Will they be friends or enemies ?
answer:
This :

Arya cocked her head to one side. “Can I be a king’s councillor and build castles and become the High Septon?” “You,” Ned said, kissing her lightly on the brow,“will marry a king and rule his castle, and your sons will be knights and princes and lords and, yes, perhaps even a High Septon.”  

Thank you for your question :)

summary:
Arya: How many Sansa’s does it take to light a lantern? 
Jon: I don’t know. 
Arya: None because she gets you to do it, sucker!...
body:
Arya: How many Sansa’s does it take to light a lantern?

Jon: I don’t know.

Arya: None because she gets you to do it, sucker!


…

Jon: I laughed but it hurt a little.

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary:
Arya: So Sansa what did you do after the battle?
Sansa: Tried to rebuild Winterfell. 
Arya: *speaking faster* And how did you do...
body:
Arya: So Sansa what did you do after the battle?

Sansa: Tried to rebuild Winterfell.

Arya: *speaking faster* And how did you do that?

Sansa: Well it was hard work and lots of planni…

Arya: *speaking faster* And you accomplished it?

Sansa: Yes.

Arya: And your boyfriends name is?

Sansa: Jon.

…

Sansa: No wait! I mean .. Jon’s just a friend, he’s just a friend.

Jon: *peaks in from around the corner*: You bitch!

summary: 🐺 Arya Stark appreciation 29/-   But they were all dead now, even Arya, everyone but her half-brother, Jon. Some nights she...
caption:
🐺 Arya Stark appreciation 29/- 

But they were all dead now, even Arya, everyone but her half-brother, Jon. Some nights she heard talk of him, in the taverns and brothels of the Ragman’s Harbor. The Black Bastard of the Wall, one man had called him. 

Even Jon would never know Blind Beth, I bet. That made her sad.

summary: How would Gendry react if he saw Arya and Edric kissing? (I don’t wanna call him Ned lol or I get weird images in my head) we...
question: How would Gendry react if he saw Arya and Edric kissing? (I don’t wanna call him Ned lol or I get weird images in my head) we already know he gets easily jealous and doesn’t really hide it lmao😂
answer: Well, I guess after he beat poor little Edric into a bloody pulp he would probably wake up from his nightmare and realize that there’s no way Arya would ever let anyone but Gendry kiss her. Then he’d walk around all day pissed off about it anyway.

reblog.comment: Well, I guess after he beat poor little Edric into a bloody pulp he would probably wake up from his nightmare and realize that there’s no way Arya would ever let anyone but Gendry kiss her. Then he’d walk around all day pissed off about it anyway.

trail.content_raw: Well, I guess after he beat poor little Edric into a bloody pulp he would probably wake up from his nightmare and realize that there’s no way Arya would ever let anyone but Gendry kiss her. Then he’d walk around all day pissed off about it anyway.
trail.content: Well, I guess after he beat poor little Edric into a bloody pulp he would probably wake up from his nightmare and realize that there’s no way Arya would ever let anyone but Gendry kiss her. Then he’d walk around all day pissed off about it anyway.

tags: source: how i met your mother
summary:
Robb: We've been trying to tell you this for years. Your bacon allergy is a lie.

Arya: Mum made it up so you'd eat healthy as a...
body:
Robb: We’ve been trying to tell you this for years. Your bacon allergy is a lie.

Arya: Mum made it up so you’d eat healthy as a kid.

Rickon: No, no! I’m just allergic to a lot of stuff.

Rickon: Bacon, doughnuts, halloween candy, not saying ‘thank you’ -

Rickon: oh my god

summary: I LOVE how passionate you are whilst writing about Gendrya. It's really amazing to see someone as invested in something as you....
question: I LOVE how passionate you are whilst writing about Gendrya. It's really amazing to see someone as invested in something as you. I could sit and read your posts all day omg; it's nice to see that i'm not the only one who'd instantly agree to have long conversations about those two without a doubt. 🤣 That, being said, i would love to hear some of your personal favorite headcanons about them, if you have any 💛
answer:
SAME!!!  I just get SO EXCITED when people want to talk about Gendrya or any of the ships I am way too personally invested in (although I’m not sure where the line is between ‘invested in something’ and ‘obsessed beyond all hope’ lol)

And did you say HEADCANONS BECAUSE YES I HAVE SOME FAVORITES:

First and foremost, FORGESEX 2K19. - To be fair, I don’t think we can call this a head canon since its most definitely happening, but picture this: Arya Stark and Gendry Waters (or possibly Gendry Baratheon, depending on whether or not he’s been legitimized by the time this goes down) in the forge in a very adult version of Acorn Hall. Gendry “too bloody lowborn” Waters would never dare to initiate a first kiss, so Arya will have to strike first. Which she will, because she is fierce. But she has to stand on her tiptoes and literally pull him down to do it. Gendry is frozen in a state of shock at first, but after a moment realizes ‘holy shit this is happening’ and that Baratheon blood kicks in x100000 and he basically attacks her back. Both of them have literally years of repressed feelings and mounting romantic/sexual tension to release at one time. 

show!Gendry only rushed in to become BFFs with Jon Snow because hello that’s Arya’s brother. He’s filled with regret that he didn’t take Arya up on her offer to serve her brother, Robb, and because he most likely believes Arya died after they separated, so he’s taking the opportunity to serve her other brother, to try and become the ‘family’ that he should have been. He hasn’t mentioned her to Jon yet because he needs to prove himself to Jon first. This is a king he can serve, a bastard like himself, one whose father fought with his own father. If he can just serve this king, and prove himself worthy, then he can talk to him about Arya. 

When they’re finally reunited, I expect tight, body-crushing, I-will-never-let-you-go hugs, along with how-dare-you-leave-me-punches, and a finally-this-is-what-we’ve-been-waiting-for-kiss (not necessarily in that order).

“It’s so hard to focus on fighting wights when he/she keeps brushing up against me/looking in my direction/existing”

Gendry takes a hit and the usually cool, calm, confident Arya immediately freaks out and frantically starts checking to see if he’s hurt. Poor Gendry can’t even tell her he’s alright, because he is just staring up at her in amazement as she fusses over him. Everyone else fighting sees this scene between the two of them, but its ok because 

Everyone Else Knows. Like, as soon as they see them in the same vicinity as each other. (I mean, Lem and Tom knew the deal, so imagine The Hound, Sansa, Brienne, Jaime, Jon, and Dany watching the two of them and exchanging *knowing glances*)

Gendry asking Jon for Arya’s hand in marriage. Jon happily giving his blessing, so excited for his bro. The Hound literally growling and telling Gendry to fuck off. (Don’t worry though, its a term of endearment coming from him. Sandor likes Gendry. So does Nymeria)

Jon and Dany will legitimize Gendry and he will become Lord of Storm’s End. Gendry and Arya get married. The rest of their adventure is detailed here by the brilliant @lizstargaryen and is canon af.

Gendry making weapons for his lady, Arya.

Even after marrying Arya, Gendry never likes Ned Dayne because he’s stubborn like that. 

Arya refusing to back down from *insert thing here* and Gendry lifting her up and physically carrying her away when he has to.

Gendrya’s babies and Braime’s babies are BEST FRIENDS. Also Rickon & Shireen’s babies, too. All these amazing babies play together when Spring comes.

And my personal favorite ASOIAF head canon is that the real reason TWOW still isn’t released yet is because it’s basically a back and forth of Arya/Gendry POV chapters detailing their reunion and subsequent forgesex and the publishers just aren’t sure where to stick the other random sample chapters that have already been released.

reblog.comment:

Jon and Dany will legitimize Gendry and he will become Lord of Storm’s End. Gendry and Arya get married. The rest of their adventure is detailed here by the brilliant @lizstargaryen and is canon af.

Gendry making weapons for his lady, Arya.

Even after marrying Arya, Gendry never likes Ned Dayne because he’s stubborn like that. 

Arya refusing to back down from *insert thing here* and Gendry lifting her up and physically carrying her away when he has to.

Gendrya’s babies and Braime’s babies are BEST FRIENDS. Also Rickon & Shireen’s babies, too. All these amazing babies play together when Spring comes.

And my personal favorite ASOIAF head canon is that the real reason TWOW still isn’t released yet is because it’s basically a back and forth of Arya/Gendry POV chapters detailing their reunion and subsequent forgesex and the publishers just aren’t sure where to stick the other random sample chapters that have already been released.
trail.content:
SAME!!!  I just get SO EXCITED when people want to talk about Gendrya or any of the ships I am way too personally invested in (although I’m not sure where the line is between ‘invested in something’ and ‘obsessed beyond all hope’ lol)

And did you say HEADCANONS BECAUSE YES I HAVE SOME FAVORITES:

First and foremost, FORGESEX 2K19. - To be fair, I don’t think we can call this a head canon since its most definitely happening, but picture this: Arya Stark and Gendry Waters (or possibly Gendry Baratheon, depending on whether or not he’s been legitimized by the time this goes down) in the forge in a very adult version of Acorn Hall. Gendry “too bloody lowborn” Waters would never dare to initiate a first kiss, so Arya will have to strike first. Which she will, because she is fierce. But she has to stand on her tiptoes and literally pull him down to do it. Gendry is frozen in a state of shock at first, but after a moment realizes ‘holy shit this is happening’ and that Baratheon blood kicks in x100000 and he basically attacks her back. Both of them have literally years of repressed feelings and mounting romantic/sexual tension to release at one time. 

show!Gendry only rushed in to become BFFs with Jon Snow because hello that’s Arya’s brother. He’s filled with regret that he didn’t take Arya up on her offer to serve her brother, Robb, and because he most likely believes Arya died after they separated, so he’s taking the opportunity to serve her other brother, to try and become the ‘family’ that he should have been. He hasn’t mentioned her to Jon yet because he needs to prove himself to Jon first. This is a king he can serve, a bastard like himself, one whose father fought with his own father. If he can just serve this king, and prove himself worthy, then he can talk to him about Arya. 

When they’re finally reunited, I expect tight, body-crushing, I-will-never-let-you-go hugs, along with how-dare-you-leave-me-punches, and a finally-this-is-what-we’ve-been-waiting-for-kiss (not necessarily in that order).

“It’s so hard to focus on fighting wights when he/she keeps brushing up against me/looking in my direction/existing”

Gendry takes a hit and the usually cool, calm, confident Arya immediately freaks out and frantically starts checking to see if he’s hurt. Poor Gendry can’t even tell her he’s alright, because he is just staring up at her in amazement as she fusses over him. Everyone else fighting sees this scene between the two of them, but its ok because 

Everyone Else Knows. Like, as soon as they see them in the same vicinity as each other. (I mean, Lem and Tom knew the deal, so imagine The Hound, Sansa, Brienne, Jaime, Jon, and Dany watching the two of them and exchanging *knowing glances*)

Gendry asking Jon for Arya’s hand in marriage. Jon happily giving his blessing, so excited for his bro. The Hound literally growling and telling Gendry to fuck off. (Don’t worry though, its a term of endearment coming from him. Sandor likes Gendry. So does Nymeria)

Jon and Dany will legitimize Gendry and he will become Lord of Storm’s End. Gendry and Arya get married. The rest of their adventure is detailed here by the brilliant @lizstargaryen and is canon af.

Gendry making weapons for his lady, Arya.

Even after marrying Arya, Gendry never likes Ned Dayne because he’s stubborn like that. 

Arya refusing to back down from *insert thing here* and Gendry lifting her up and physically carrying her away when he has to.

Gendrya’s babies and Braime’s babies are BEST FRIENDS. Also Rickon & Shireen’s babies, too. All these amazing babies play together when Spring comes.

And my personal favorite ASOIAF head canon is that the real reason TWOW still isn’t released yet is because it’s basically a back and forth of Arya/Gendry POV chapters detailing their reunion and subsequent forgesex and the publishers just aren’t sure where to stick the other random sample chapters that have already been released.
